conversations.content: ＂A ninja's true potential is realized through the act of marriage.＂ - A Hinomoto Guide for Beginning Ninjas.
Wow, this is some revolutionary stuff! Buuuuut...
Impassioned Ninja Aoi
I bet it would be hard to actually DO this, though... Hmm...
Tweet tweet!
Aoi's Two Pigeons Snow and Ashe
What has you so fascinated, Aoi?
The guide I've been getting by carrier pigeon is talking about an AMAZING new category of ninja techniques!
Do tell.
They're called ＂ninja bride＂ skills, and they're taking our world by storm!
Ninja...bride skills?
Yep! Basically, you fight like a bride would while wearing a wedding dress.
Wedding dresses are sacred in Hinomoto, and believed to purify the body of evil.
So these skills involve using a dress to purify yourself and unleash your inner power.
Tweet tweet!
And all of that comes from merely wearing a wedding dress?
You know it, sister! Heck, plenty of miracles in Hinomoto have been brought about by the power of love and the resolve to stay with someone for life.
So that means all this stuff must have an effect. ...Probably. I don't ACTUALLY know, but I'm pretty sure it works.
It sounds like these wedding dresses of Hinomoto are no ordinary garments.
Oh, that's for sure.
Still, I'm never gonna know if this stuff actually works or not because I don't own a wedding dress. Boo!
That is a problem, yes.
Normally, I'd just throw in the towel at this point and move on to something else. But not this time!
See, 'cause I'll be a lot more help to the prince if I can master these new skills.
After he accepted me despite all my weirdness, chipping in more around here is the least I can do.
So I don't want to give up at the first hurdle!
I see.
If I might ask, is the design for the dress  you want in that guide of yours?
Yep! They put in a complete set of instructions for folks who want to try making their own dress.
Then I have everything I need.
Wait, you're gonna MAKE me one?!
How could I refuse after seeing your devotion to Euden?
Aw, thanks, Cleo! You're the BEST!
Look at this, everybody!
I can't believe I'm wearing a real wedding dress right now. You're AMAZING, Cleo!
Tweet tweet!
Your joy in receiving it has made all of my effort worth it. Good luck.
I won't let you down! I'm gonna train real hard and keep my master safe!
Heya, Aoi! I hear you're gonna be trying out some crazy new ninja skills?
So, like, what kind of ninja stuff can you even DO in a wedding dress?
Yeah, do ya attack like yer cuttin' a cake or somethin'?
Well, I think cake-cutting's an Alberian tradition. But here, let me check the guide for an example...
Ah, here's an interesting ninja bride skill. ＂Fine Cutlery＂! Hiiiiyayayaya!
Tweeeeeeeet!
Ow! Hey, watch where you're swingin' that thing, kid!
Aaagh! You're going to shred our clothes!
Please stop! I don't want to have to repair everyone's torn garments!
Nooo! I need my clothes! They're the only thing that keeps me from being naked!
I suppose it does make fine cuts... Wait, this is no time for pondering the name! Stop attacking us, Aoi!
You are supposed to PROTECT the prince, not dice him up and serve him to guests!
Ack! Okay, I'm stopping, I'm stopping!
Holy crow, man. I thought I was gonna be sliced to ribbons there.
Hmm... According to my guide, that technique is supposed to be for creating an elegant atmosphere, not hurting people.
Perhaps it would be better suited to more relevant circumstances.
Ooooh! So I just used it at the wrong time! Hee hee! Oh man, what a dope.
A ＂dope＂? Ya just tried to murder us!
Yes, but she DIDN'T murder anyone, which is all that really matters.
And while it certainly could have gone better, isn't that what training is for?
Yep! In the future, I'll use my skills properly AND learn lots of new ones!
Good luck, Aoi. We're counting on you!
You...really mean it?
Aw, I'm so honored!
I won't let you down! I'm gonna become the strongest ninja bride in the land!
＂The horn covering is a traditional form of wedding headwear believed to hide one's 'horns,' which symbolize the anger of the wearer.＂
＂Ninja bride skills, however, involve deliberately unleashing this power. The resulting explosion of anger is fiercer than any volcano.＂ - A Hinomoto Guide for Beginning Ninjas.
Wow! All this time, I thought the horns on this were just a fashion thing! Okay, what else does it say...?
＂Order is a necessity in any troop. The sin of sloth must be stamped out by righteous anger.＂
＂Ninja bride skills are pivotal in this, for they allow the wielder to enforce order to a degree otherwise unthinkable.＂ ...Oh man, that is SO cool.
All right, time to go out and do my job. If anyone is threatening the order of the castle, I'm gonna give 'em what-for!
Let's do this, guys!
Tweet!
Heh heh heh... Another devilish prank is ready to be unleashed upon the world. I can't WAIT to see the looks of surprise on everyone's faces!
(Ha! Order is always in grave danger when Luca is about!)
(Okay, Aoi, let's do this. First, I steel my heart...then I deliver swift justice!)
Ninja Bride Skill: Exposed Horns! Raaaagh!
When are you going to stop trying to prank people and grow up already?!
Seriously, act your age!
Ack! A-all right, all right! Jeez, where the heck's this comin' from, anyway?!
That's right, cower before my mighty ninja skill!
Think about it this way. Which matters to you more: pranks or me?
Umm...pranks?
WROOOOONG ANSWER!
Whoa! Calm down! Calm down! I get it already, I'll stop!
...Hmm? Ah, I think I just heard a voice from the back garden.
Everyone should be sound asleep now, so this person is clearly up to no good— which means it's Aoi's time to shine!
Hah! Hah! Haaah!
Do you have any idea what time it is?!
Aoi? Whatever are you doi—ACK! Stop poking me with your horns!
This is no poke—it is an advanced ninja technique! Now tell me, what do you think you're doing training this late at night?
You need to take better care of yourself! We can't have you collapsing from exhaustion with so much still unfinished!
Good heavens, I had no idea you could be so strict.
I will be in as soon as I finish this set. Perhaps you should go get some sleep.
Oh no you don't! One set turns into twenty, and you'll still be out here when the sun comes up!
If you don't go to bed right now, I'll give you the horns again! *poke*
Hee hee hee! Stop it, that tickles! *sigh* Fine, I'll go. Are you happy now?
Ah, I see there's a light on in that room. It appears that someone else dares threaten the order of the castle!
Stop right there! How many times must I tell you not to snack between meals?!
The hell's wrong with yer eyes, Aoi? They're all bloodshot and crazy.
I can't have you snacking so much you skip out on the next proper meal!
Why, just the other day, you snuck out of the house, stuffed your face full of food, and came home so full our dinner went to waste! And after Cleo worked so hard!
Hey now, that was one time! Every stomach's got its off days!
ENOUGH! Accept your punishment. Ninja Bride Skill: Exposed Horns! *poke*
Ow! Knock it off, ya weirdo! That hurts!
Urrrgh...
...Huh? Wh-where am I? I coulda sworn I was just over in the dining hall.
It got you too, eh?
Someone has been naaaaughty! And I'm gonna fiiiiind them!
The hell is WRONG with her?
I believe she used one of her ninja bride skills so much that it took control of her. We must do something, and quickly.
You're strong, Ranzal. Can't ya just return her to her senses with a little knock to the old noggin?
No way! I ain't gettin' NEAR her!
You sound legitimately frightened, Ranzal.
'Cause I AM! Ain't a man alive what can face THAT kinda rage.
Quiet, you fool! She's going to hear—
I FOOOOUND YOOOOUUUU!
NOOOO!
EEEK! We're done for!
I never thought it would end like this!
GRAAAAAGH! Feel the horns of looooveee!
Stop this, Aoi!
...Graaagh?
Stay back! She's crazy in the coconut!
Aoi, look how terrified everyone is of you right now. Do you REALLY think that's what being a ninja is all about?
I know you're just trying to maintain order, but this isn't the way.
Did you really learn your ninja bride skills just to create suffering for others?
SCREEEEE! ...Huh? M-master?
Thank goodness you finally returned to your senses.
Huh? What do you mean? Did I, um...do something terrible?
YES, YOU DID!
It's like ya were a literal demon. Even had the horns'n everything!
Oh, I am SO so sorry! I was just trying to make bad people see the error of their ways, not become one myself!
I wanted to protect order, but I ended up creating chaos instead.
Geez, these ninja bride skills are really hard to control.
So it seems. But after going through this, do you feel better equipped to handle them next time?
Yes. I've seen the error of my ways, and I won't let this happen again!
Being a ninja bride is about love and caring for others—I won't forget that!
You want me to find your missing wife? Tell me what happened.
One day she just up and vanished on me. She's always been a mite sickly, and I worry she may have collapsed somewhere.
Please help me find her!
Leave it to me.
The power of my ninja bride skills will have her found in no time!
...Or so I thought, but this isn't going very well at ALL. Looks like I'll need to bring in the big firepower for this one.
Ninja Bride Skill: Open Ears!
Ooo, I heard a JUICY rumor the other day! The wife of the man across the way has finally had enough and wants a DIVORCE!
Heavens, really? Oh, but HERE'S a story: Apparently an old lady has gone missing!
That's the first I've heard of that. But never mind old people—let me tell you about that new girl in town!
...So in the end, I heard loads of useless gossip, and nothing at all about the old woman I'm interested in. Yaaay, me!
Wait, I shouldn't be celebrating that. What the heck am I going to DO?
Tweet! Tweet tweet tweet!
What is it? Did you find something?
Wait... Is that who I think it is?!
Umm, excuse me?
My, but that is a lovely dress, young lady.
Hey, thanks. It's a style of wedding dress from Hinomoto. Super pretty, right?!
A wedding dress? Oh, how lovely. That certainly takes me back.
What I wouldn't give to return to those halcyon days of yore...
But alas, I'm just a wrinkled old lady now. Nothing at all like the pretty young thing that he first fell in love with.
Who do you mean?
Why, my beloved, of course! He's so very kind, and we've been there for each other through thick and thin across the years.
But lately, I only seem to make life harder for him. I seem to be past my sell-by date.
So one day, I ran off. I simply couldn't bear to be a burden on him any longer.
I'm sure he doesn't feel that way. In fact, I know he's super worried about you!
And yet I just can't stand the thought of returning to him as I am now. Not unless there were some way to be pretty again...
Then leave it to me!
What do you mean?
If it's facing him you're worried about, my ninja bride skills will give you the confidence boost you need!
Surely you aren't implying that you can return me to my younger self, because such a thing is simply not possible.
Ha! Being a ninja bride is all ABOUT making the impossible possible!
Besides, what better way to show the power of ninja bride skills than by helping two lovers reunite?
So you just leave this to me!
...Sorry for the wait, but I've brought someone here to see you.
Is it my wife?! Is she all right?!
Oh, she's BETTER than all right! Look!
Hello, dear.
Heavens! You look just like you did when we first met! ...Is this a trick?
No tricks! She really IS your wife!
This is the power of bridal transformation! It can reach into days long gone and bring your former self to the present!
After I told this young lady here how I couldn't bear to face you as I was, she used magic to make me look young.
Even though it will only last a short while, you can at least see the woman you once fell in love with again.
I'm sorry for all the trouble I've been causing you. But just look how pretty I am now! There's not a wrinkle to be seen!
Wait, is THAT what has been troubling you this entire time? What nonsense!
Huh?
I'm just as wrinkled as you, aren't I?
Our wrinkles serve as proof of the full lives we've led together. The more you have, the more memories you've made!
Oh, my love!
Well, that took a turn for the adorable.
Tweet tweet!
Thank you so much for finding my wife, young lady. And that ninja transformation was quite a sight, too!
Uh...sure? I mean, um, you're welcome.
I owe you my deepest thanks, young lady; you helped me to remember what is TRULY important.
*sniff* Aw, you guys are the best. Stay happy together, all right?
Score one more for ninja bride skills! ...Although I suppose I can't actually take much of the credit this time.
Tweet?
It was so moving to see the love between a real married couple!
I've got my work cut out as a ninja bride if I want to compare to that.
But I'm gonna do my best, guys!
...Marriage fraud?
Yes. It seems to be a worrying trend in town lately. Newly-married husbands are simply disappearing into the night, along with the life savings of their wives.
This is no one-time affair, either; it is a well-organized criminal operation.
Yeah, I've been hearin' tales about that. Not much to go on in terms'a trackin' down the culprits, though, which means it's probably gonna keep happenin'.
And lemme tell ya, that... Huh?
I heard everything! Leave this to me!
If these criminals think all brides can do is run away defeated and cry, they've got another thing coming! I will avenge all of the victims with my ninja bride skills!
You sound very confident, Aoi. I assume you have a plan?
I'm glad you asked! I've actually been having these two investigate this case for a while now.
Tweet tweet!
Recently, they caught wind of a party  where these fake grooms are meeting with their intended victims.
Ya really are a master of this whole ninja thing, ain't ya?
Yeah, espionage is sort of my forte— although this was a real toughie.
Anyway, my plan is to pretend to be a bride so I can sneak into that party! What do you think, master?
Sounds fine to me. Happy hunting.
Then let's go, my little pigeons. Oh, and you're coming too, master!
I'm sorry?
I didn't actually think I was going to be a part of this plan.
Shhh! Master, we're in the middle of using Ninja Bride Skill: Newlywed Disguise!
See, you can't get into this party unless you're a couple, so that's why you're here.
So let's do something to show everyone that we're newlyweds!
Er...what did you have in mind?
I dunno—I'm still new to all of this ninja bride stuff. I was actually sort of hoping you could come up with something.
Hmm... Maybe we could hold hands?
We haven't been together long enough for THAT! We need to get to know each other better first!
What kind of couple would marry without knowing each other first? ...Wait, look!
Hmm? What am I looking at?
That man is going to the back of the house all alone. Don't you think it's suspicious?
Hey, yeah!
Let's follow him.
...Is everything ready?
Yep. You can beat it whenever you want. Har har har! Who woulda thought fake marriages would make so much money!
Bwa ha ha! The best part is how happy the fools look while they're being swindled!
That must be their leader!
I think you're right. Let's do this, Aoi!
Stay where you are, criminals!
The ninja bride Aoi is here to bring you to justice, so reach for the sky!
Huh? Who the hell are—AAARGH!!
Uh oh. Time for this bird to fly!
Boss, no! Don't leave me!
Behold my exposed horns! ...Wait, he's gone? Dangit!
Where did he go?!
Ugh. I was so sure we had him.
Well, at least we caught his lackey. Let's go inside and tell everyone what's really going on here.
Listen to me, everyone! Your husbands are con artists!
Wh-what are you talking about?
We have proof! We caught a lackey from their criminal ring behind this building!
Urgh...
Wait, I know him. He meets up with my husband all the time.
He meets with my husband, too! Are we REALLY all being lied to?
How could anyone be so cruel as to abuse love and devotion for their own gain?
Don't worry—their misdeeds won't go unpunished. I shall avenge you!
Er, but how?
I'll use my ninja bride skills to deliver heaven's justice to the foul fiends who dare abuse love for their own gain!
Just leave it to me!
How can we trust a stranger when we can't even trust our husbands?
Because a ninja bride never lies.
I...don't actually have a response to that. Good luck, I guess?
With so many hopes riding on me, I can't afford a single misstep.
But shouldering the sadness of scorned maidens is the duty of a ninja bride! ...Oh, and her darling husband, of course.
Let's do this, master!
This thing is becoming a lot more complicated than what I was promised...
After discovering the existence of a group taking money from women through fake marriages, Aoi sets out to defeat them.
Eventually, her investigation leads to their hideout—and with her friends at her side, she decides to settle the score for good.
Hear me, evildoers! Today is the day I dispense your final justice!
Who the hell are you?!
I am the ninja bride Aoi, known across the land as a friend of brides and an enemy to all who would do them harm!
I know about all your terrible deeds, and I'm here to see you pay!
We have your back, Aoi.
Time fer a wallopin'!
Behold my exposed horns! Followed by Fine Cutlery!
Damn it, who ARE these guys?! They're wipin' the floor with us!
We ain't even done nothin' wrong! If ya wanna blame someone, blame the idiots who were stupid enough to fall for our clearly obvious con!
Toying with someone's heart is the worst crime you can commit—and you WILL pay!
Aw, damn it all!
Looks like that's that.
We owe our success to Aoi's efforts.
Wait a second. Where's the man Aoi and I cornered the other day...?
Stay alert, everyone! There's more of them!
That there is, little man.
Aaah!
Damn it, he's got Aoi!
Don't try any of that ＂ninja bride＂ crap, or I'll snap yer little neck like a twig!
Hang on, Aoi! We'll save ya!
I wouldn't move if I were you, unless you waaant...SNAP!
Grrr!
Now cry for mercy! Beg for your life! Bwaaa ha ha ha ha!
...Heh.
Do you think this is funny? I hold your life in my hands!
Oh, I know. You're totally in control. Me and my friends are powerless.
But you forgot one very important skill. Perhaps the most important one of all...
And that's the anger of all the brides you deceived!
Behold the ultimate technique! Ninja Bride Skill: Bridal Train!
Chaaaaaaaaaarge!
Waaaaaaaah!
Take this! And this! And some of THIS! It's what you deserve for trampling all over our love!
I sent out my invitations and hired a non-refundable caterer, and I'm going to take that money out of your HIDE!
Wh-what's happeni—AAAAUUUGH!
You'll have plenty of time to think about all the ways you've wronged us when you're rotting in a dungeon somewhere!
Heeeeelp!
Now do you see the true power of a bride's righteous anger?
Once they've begun, no one can stop them.
Mercy! Meeeercy! I'll never do it again! Please forgive me!
NEVER!
Eeeeeek!
I feel SO much better now.
Me too! Also, I think this experience will make me a better judge of character.
I'll never let myself be deceived again!
You got to let out your anger AND we saved the day—it's the perfect ending!
We turned those guys over to the law, so I think we're done here.
Thank you for your help, everyone.
It's you ladies what did the heavy liftin'. We mostly just mopped up afterward.
I tell ya what, though—I ain't never gonna underestimate a bride again.
I also find myself with a new appreciation for these ninja bride skills.
Strength is just another quality that brides possess in spades.
Even though they act with love and kindness, brides are also SUPER powerful!
I think those qualities are what inspired the creation of ninja bride skills in the first place.
There's clearly more to this than I thought.
Tweet tweet!
Oh! Welcome back, master! And you two, of course.
You really saved us there, Aoi. I don't know what we would have done without you.
*sniff* Master, stop! I'm gonna bawl!
Oh, but I DO have one question.
What is it?
I started practicing these new skills to help you, and it honestly hasn't been easy.
But ARE they helping?
Without a doubt. In fact, I think you're more dependable than ever.
And not just when you're catching crooks. We're all lucky to have you around.
Master!
In that case, I'm going to redouble all of my efforts!
